answers.answer: sorry, don't read that much here, have you posted your stats before? do you have hepatitis, or are you currently treating it? if you are talking about rapid weight gain (maybe extra water retention, etc) I have read that some docs think that hepatitis could be the culprit in some people, also there is menopause, and other etiologies...also hope youre seeing good docs to get to the bottom of it, it is my understanding that excessive thirst is also a symptom of diabetes, etc...hopefully youre going to good docs in related fields, etc. best to you.

question: in two weeks ive blown up so much that i look 9 months pregnent,and i go to the gym 5 days a week all  of a sudden i am so uncomfortable what now am i getting realy sick i pee all day long and im sooooo thirsty
title: i feel like im going to pop
